title: Bug 121682: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description: Exception is thrown when trying to export data from the attached report.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row, an exception is thrown.
EB: The software should not throw an exception while exporting data from a table that contains a highlight rule and a map rule in the group row.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a table with a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row. 2. Preview the attached report. 3. Try to export the data from the table.
